abstract: Steven P. Jobs, the leader who propelled Apple to its current heights, is known for many things, but he was not really a deal maker.
snippet: Steven P. Jobs, the leader who propelled Apple to its current heights, is known for many things, but he was not really a deal maker.
lead_paragraph: As Steven P. Jobs steps down as chief executive of Apple Inc., the iPhone maker will lose the leader who rescued it from near-death and built it into a technology colossus.

headline.main: With Departure of Jobs, Will Apple Warm to Deal-Making?

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
